meanings.definition: A set of five offspring born at one birth.
meanings.sent1: The hospital celebrated the birth of quintuplets.
meanings.sent2: The quintuplets all look alike because they are siblings.
meanings.sent3: The quintuplets decided to form a band together.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a chorus of quintuplets.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used the quintuplets as an example in biology class.

meanings.definition: A group or combination of five similar things.
meanings.sent1: The store offered a discount for buying quintuplets of socks.
meanings.sent2: She arranged the flowers in quintuplets to create a beautiful centerpiece.
meanings.sent3: The quintuplets of colors in the painting made it stand out.
meanings.sent4: The five flavors blended together like a perfect quintuplets of taste.
meanings.sent5: The quintuplets of books on the shelf caught her eye.
